scripts.deploy:staging: pnpm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting:rep-flow-staging --project rep-flow-staging
scripts.deploy:prod: pnpm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting:rep-flow-prod --project rep-flow-prod
scripts.deploy:staging:rules: firebase use rep-flow-staging && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules,firestore:indexes
scripts.deploy:prod:rules: firebase use rep-flow-prod && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules,firestore:indexes
scripts.deploy:all:rules: pnpm run deploy:staging:rules && pnpm run deploy:prod:rules
